verbs.description: russian website names [ARG1: third gru officer] [V: involved] [ARG2: in salisbury poisoning] the russian news website fontanka named on wednesday a third gru military intelligence operative sergey fedotov as having been involved in trying to kill ex - spy sergei skripal in the english city of salisbury england yulia dawn sturgess britain london salisbury queen elizabeth gardens soviet union david stamp gru sergei skripal nerve agent telegraph prezzo alistair smout fontanka moscow maxim rodionov russian stephen addison novichok sergey fedotov officer russia
